title: Pups and Cups (of ☕️)
description:
Growing up, Jordan Karcher thought nothing could be better than being a veterinarian and helping animals for a living. Though he didn’t become a vet, Jordan did find a way to combine two of his life’s passions — coffee and dogs — into a business with a cause.

Grounds & Hounds Coffee Co.

Follow Grounds & Hounds on Twitter or Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
